title: What are the best interdisciplinary fields to work in? - Quora

response.answer_text: even if there was such a best, what good would it be if you sucked at both or either? pick fields that use all your skills and talents. in my case, I’ve got an engineering background and soft skills from many years as a sales engineer, and now I’m a computer Science teacher.

The next generation of data scientists could provide a different kind of thinking for a PhD in mechanics. The doctor turned into a biology researcher, which provided him with a strong knowledge of the constitution of animals
